casebody.data:
Benson, Respondent, v. Gerlach, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 9, 1890.)

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and Brady and Daniels, JJ.

Hamilton R. Squier, for appellant. C. G. Patterson, for respondent.

Motion denied; $10 costs of motion to respondent to abide event of appeal. See 4 N. Y. Supp. 273.
